AT_LEAST_ONE_FILE_OR_FAQ_REQUIRED: For active documenations, at least one file or FAQ required
COMPONENTS_PLACEHOLDER: If the documentation is related to page components, you can select them here
CONFIRM_EXIT_PAGE: Are you sure you want to exit the page?
CONFIRM_NAVIGATE_TO_DETAIL_PAGE: Are you sure you want to go back to the page detail page?
CONTENT_PLACEHOLDER:
Give a title for this content
Type your content with useful elements like info panel, table, link, picture etc.
HIGHLIGHT_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to highlight the document? Highlighted documents are shown on the Documentation homepage.
HIGHLIGHT_TOOLTIP: You can use this button to highlight your document for 2 months. Highlighted documents are shown on the Documentation Homepage.
NO_FAQS_FOR_LANG: No FAQs for selected panel language
REMOVE_HIGHLIGHT_TOOLTIP: You can use this button to remove the "Highlight" status from the document. This document will no longer be shown in the Highlighted Document category on the Documentation homepage.
